definition[0]: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
example[0]: The coins may look the same but one’s a forgery.
example[1]: Thanks for your help – I’ll do the same for you one day.
example[2]: Your measurements are exactly the same as Dana’s.
definition[1]: used to say that a particular person or thing does not change
example[3]: Things just won’t be the same without Sam.
